Research Interests

Iâ€™m particularly interested in developing frameworks that leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) to automate and enhance verification processes in Electronic Design Automation (EDA). My current research focuses on:

  • SystemVerilog Assertion Generation using LLMs
  • Model Reconciliation for robotic path planning
  • Agentic workflows in EDA for verification environment generation
